attributes.action: Make shop owners hide the fat foods behind counters
attributes.additional_details: I believe it will have a huge impact on the health of the kids and the general put
attributes.background: All these unhealthy foods should go behind the counters snd hidden like cigarettes.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure exactly which foods you'd like to be hidden from display. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
